Title: Fathom
Production companies:
Sandbox Films 
 Impact Partners 
 Walking Upstream Pictures 
 Back Allie Entertainment 
 Hidden Candy
Release: In April 2021, Apple TV+ acquired worldwide distribution rights to the film, and set it for a June 25, 2021, release. It had its world premiere at the Tribeca Film Festival on June 16, 2021. It also screened at AFI DOCS on June 23, 2021.
Critical reception: Fathom holds a 50% approval rating on review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, based on 16 reviews, with a weighted average of 7/10.  On Metacritic, the film holds a rating of 67 out of 100, based on eight critics, indicating "generally favorable reviews".
